name: force-publish-schedule
author: Saturngod

sections.description: Sometime we want to publish schedule post. We make a post like event, we need to publish that post. Schedule post can’t see visitor and we need to forece publish. This Plugin can help do that. Include Admin Panel and one click to publish all or can select the post from schedule to publish.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload ‘forecepublish’ folder to to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Change to schedule when I update that post ?

Yes, I need to develop this future.
sections.changelog:
0.3.1

  • Option Path

0.3

  • Change Date Format

0.2

  • Add checkbox for selection

0.1

  • Start
